generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, with cars parked along the sides and pedestrians on the road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by orange and white bollards and lined with trees and a low wall.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible, including a prominent one with "NATIONAL-BANK" signage in the background and other commercial and residential buildings along the street.
- wall: A low, gray concrete wall runs along the right side of the sidewalk, separating it from a higher boundary or fence.
- fence: A fence is visible behind the wall on the right side, appearing as a low, possibly metal or concrete barrier.
- pole: Several orange and white striped bollards are present along the sidewalk, acting as vertical poles.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible in the distance, hanging from a pole over the road.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign (possibly a "No Entry" or similar) is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are visible along both sides of the road, and some leaves are scattered on the road surface.
- terrain: There are patches of grass or vegetation visible in the foreground and along the sidewalk, particularly near the bollards.
- sky: The sky is partially visible above the buildings, appearing overcast or cloudy.
- person: Two people are visible walking in the middle of the road, appearing to be engaged in conversation or hugging.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the road, including a silver car, a white car, a dark gray car, and a red van.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible in the distance, parked or stopped near the traffic light.
